item.title: Hack Week 2025: How these engineers liquid-cooled a GPU server

item.description:
üöÄ Hack Week 2025 at Dropbox focused on the theme ‚ÄúKeep It Simple,‚Äù encouraging innovation and collaboration. One highlight was the ‚ÄúLiquid Cooling CPU/GPU Hardware‚Äù project, which won the Learn Fast award. The team developed a custom liquid cooling system for GPU servers to address the thermal demands of AI workloads. This system demonstrated significant benefits, including lower operating temperatures and quieter performance. Future plans include expanding testing across multiple data‚Ä¶

item.title: Driving AI adoption at Dropbox: a conversation with CTO Ali Dasdan
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
üöÄ AI is transforming how Dropbox operates, enhancing productivity for engineers. In early 2025, a shift occurred, leading to over 90% AI adoption among engineering teams. This change was driven by leadership alignment and a culture of knowledge-sharing. CTO Ali Dasdan emphasizes AI‚Äôs role in automating tasks and allowing deeper focus on coding and innovation. #AI #Dropbox #Productivity #Innovation #TechTrends
